name: vendure-nextjs-ecommerce-template
description: Production-ready e-commerce template with Vendure backend and Next.js storefront

scripts.dev: echo 'Use docker:up for full stack, or backend:dev/storefront:dev for individual services'
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../storefront && npm install
scripts.clean: docker-compose down -v && rm -rf backend/node_modules storefront/node_modules backend/dist storefront/.next
scripts.clean:windows: docker-compose down -v && rmdir /s /q backend\node_modules storefront\node_modules backend\dist storefront\.next
